title: Satay Chicken Skewers
ingredients: ['120ml coconut milk', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground coriander', '1 teaspoon yellow curry powder', '1 teaspoon fish sauce', '1/2 teaspoon chilli oil', '450g chicken mini fillets', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander', '1 tablespoon chopped unsalted peanuts', '12 wooden skewers, soaked in water for 15 minutes', '225g Thai peanut sauce']
